*eLucidate Science* is a collection of guides and tips for (under)graduate students and others interested in learning about open and reproducible science. Articles are based on my experience as a PhD student and reproducibility reviewer for [Meta-Psychology](https://open.lnu.se/index.php/metapsychology/).

## Education

Linköping University \| Linköping, Sweden PhD in Disability Research \| Jan 2022 - present

Linnaeus University \| Växjö, Sweden M.Sc. in Work and Organizational Psychology \| 2019 - 2021

University of Zadar \| Zadar, Croatia Bachelor of Psychology \| 2016 - 2019

## Experience

Editorial Assistant and Reproducibility Coordinator at [Meta-Psychology](https://open.lnu.se/index.php/metapsychology/) \| Linnaeus University \| 2021 - present

Research Assistant \| Linnaeus University \| 2021 - 2022
